author: Ali Reynolds
description: Fernet Branca adds an almost smoky note to the rye whiskey, Yellow Chartreuse and cherry brandy combo. A great bittersweet after-dinner digestif.
name: Made Man
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
